attributes.action: Teach Life-skills in schools, including Inter-personal Skills
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It seems as though many children are not responding to the old paradigm of academic achievement, and want to know how to do more than survive in the world. This needs to include learning inter-personal skills that encourage communication and how to convey their needs with each other, and outside their social groups.
This can be taught in a right-brain context using drama, music, art etc to draw out what the students realy want for themselves, to move past the complaining but not communicating attitudes we pass on to our children.
